snippet.title: Microscopic Journey for the Apple II
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

In Microscopic Journey you make your way through various parts of the human body.

Different dangers will await you, like white blood cells (which you can destroy with your laser rope if lucky) gates and barriers.


What I think:

Not the most fun game and the controls don't help it either.
